thread.title: Shelley Krassman - Manitou Curling Club
thread.title_full: Sport Systems reviewed by Shelley Krassman - Manitou Curling Club

author: Shelley Krassman - Manitou Curling Club
title: Shelley Krassman - Manitou Curling Club
text: Sport Systems provided excellent service to our small, rural Curling Club. We could not have purchased the seating without Sport Systems adding us to a larger order, making it affordable for our Club. The service provided was prompt, courteous and with a genuine understanding of our unique needs and circumstances. Price and delivery were as Quote: d. Follow up questions on installation were answered immediately. We have recommended this company, and will continue to do so, to neighbouring community clubs and venues.
